item.title: After Promising Review Of Deadly Abortion Pill, FDA Greenlights A Copycat Version
item.description: The generic mifepristone manufacturer Evita Solutions wants to ‘normalize abortion’ and make it ‘accessible to all.’

item.title: Delaware University Won’t Punish Students Who Thanked Charlie Kirk Assassin In School TV Program
item.description: Sources say university officials had hoped the despicable incident would just 'go away quietly.' They were wrong.
